tech_news.title: Activision Responds to Complaints of AI-Generated Assets in Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 - IGN
tech_news.description: Activision has issued a statement in response to player outcry regarding the seeming use of generative AI art assets in a number of areas of Call of Duty: Black Ops 7.

tech_news.title: A recent Switch 2 update blocks some third-party docks, but Nintendo isn’t saying why - The Verge
tech_news.description: Nintendo Switch 2 update 21.0.0 brought some unwelcome changes to owners of some third-party console docks, which no longer work as intended.

tech_news.title: Apple’s $230 Cloth iPhone Pouch Is Already Sold Out — Here’s What It’s Like - Bloomberg.com
tech_news.description: Early Friday, a crowd of people lined up outside Apple Inc.’s SoHo location in New York to be among the first to get their hands on a new, limited-edition product: an up to $230 iPhone pouch the company said is “inspired by the concept of a piece of cloth.”
